item.title: GRPC & GRPC-Web multiplexed in Istio
item.description: Envoy had grpc-web support ealy on. It’s used in the official grpc-web tutorial docs. In the envoy config of this tutorial, both grpc & grpcWeb are exposed via a single listener port. This is nice model when you have a production deployment in which some clients (mobile apps) want to speak to the GRPC protocol directly, but web apps want to go down to http/1.1 to work with browsers’ xhr or fetch requests.
